newsitem.title: USA: Aspen Technology board OKs stock split.
newsitem.headline: Aspen Technology board OKs stock split.

text.p: Aspen Technology Inc said on Tuesday its board of directors had approved a two-for-one stock split of outstanding shares of common stock.

The company said in a statement that the split would be effected through a stock dividend. It will entitle each stockholder of record as of Feb 14 to receive one additional share for each outstanding share of common stock held on the record date.
The stock split will be effective as of Feb 28. Upon completion of the split, the number of shares of AspenTech common stock outstanding will be about 19.7 million.
